advices: You want to learn how to play? Read the player's guide! https://guide.draftbot.com/
If you are looking for tips on how to progress, go here: https://guide.draftbot.com/
The `/friendlyfight` command does not exist anymore, but it is possible to start a friendly fight through the {command:fight} command.
When you think you're in a bind or don't know what action to take, it may be worth not reacting to the event.
If you want to kick someone out of your guild who has no server in common with you or the bot, use their ranking.
It is possible to get pets in guild rewards.
The list of existing commands can be obtained with the {command:help} command.
If you want to exchange with the community or the developers, join the bot's discord: https://discord.gg/DxW4DCuE4V
It is possible to contribute for the improvement of DraftBot on the Discord of the bot: https://discord.gg/AP3Wmzb
The command {command:classesinfo} allows you to compare the different classes you can select.
The command {command:classes} allows to select a class.
Some objects give a reward every day. To collect it, use the command {command:dailybonus}.
If you want to equip an object, use the {command:switch} command.
Aliases for commands have been deleted from the bot since it switched to slash commands.
To get more information about a command, use the {command:help} command followed by the command you want information about.
The command {command:guilddailybonus} allows you to receive a reward every 22 hours if you are in a guild.
Use {command:drink} to drink the potion from your inventory.
Use the {command:update} command to get information about the last update of the bot.
Follow the bot on twitter! https://twitter.com/DraftBot_
DraftBot is also translated into French! To play in French, use the {command:language} command.
To invite the bot to your server, use the link available on the bot's Discord. The link to the Discord can be obtained using the {command:invitedraftbot} command.
Some classes give an advantage in combat and others in reports due to a higher amount of health points.
The most powerful classes are also the most difficult to play in the reports.
A guild name cannot be changed.
You can use the rank of a player in some commands to target them without having to know their Discord username.
If you don't take care of your pets, they may play bad tricks on you.
When a pet is sold or traded, it loses all its affection.
A trained pet no longer loses affection (unless it is sold or traded).
Exchanging pets using the guild's shelter ({command:pettransfer}) does not cause them to lose affection.
A trained pet can give you bonuses during your adventure.
You can give your pet a nickname using the {command:petnickname} command.
You can free a pet with the {command:petfree} command.
Soups are not the most profitable source of food, but they can quickly increase a pet's affection.

More information on pets is available on the dedicated guide page:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-principale/familiers/

More information on guilds is available on the guide page dedicated to them:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-principale/guildes

More information on fights is available on the guide page dedicated to them:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-principale/combats/

More information on classes is available on the guide page dedicated to them:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/main/classes/

More information on state alterations is available on the dedicated page of the guide:
https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/notions-principale/alterations-detat
It is impossible to access the shop while imprisoned.
The {command:shop} command allows you to purchase various items.
Old changelogs are available here: https://history.draftbot.com/
The bot has a website! https://draftbot.com/
A player's badges are displayed on their profile as a reaction.
Some stuff can only be purchased from the guild store, using the {command:guildshop} command.
A higher level guild gives you better guild daily rewards.
It is not possible to change the bot prefix anymore.
A guild has a warehouse. Its content can be displayed using the {command:guildstorage} command.
It is easier to train a familiar if the members of a guild are cooperative.
Each guild has a refuge. The list of animals in the shelter can be accessed using the {command:guildshelter} command.
It is wiser to feed rare pets with better food sources, whereas common pets can easily be fed only with treats.
Any idea to improve the bot? Use the {command:idea} command.
It is wise to keep money for healing purposes.
A ranking is made every week to designate the player who earned the most points during the week. To view this ranking, use the {command:top score} command and select `week` in the `timing` option.

Money is one of the most important resources in the game. You can get some from reports ({command:report}), items with daily effects ({command:dailybonus}) or daily guild rewards ({command:guilddailybonus}).
Out of HP? Before buying the healing at 3,000 ðŸ’° make sure the shop doesn't have more profitable potions!
Want to get a super extra brand new badge to sublimate your profile? Vote for the bot! https://top.gg/bot/448110812801007618
Potions sold in the shop are often available at attractive prices.
To rank first in the weekly ranking and win a badge, be regular in your reports and don't be afraid to fight.
The global ranking is available by using the {command:top score} command.
The weekly ranking is available by using the {command:top score} command and using the `timing` option.
Your guild is lvl 50? You then have a 1% chance to get a badge for all guild members at each daily reward.
Once your pet is trained, you no longer need to feed it.
The time to feed your pet again depends on its rarity! One star = one hour!
You can sell your pet to another player thanks to the {command:petsell} command.
By clicking on the badges of the profiles of the players who have them, you can learn how they got them.
If you want to see another player's profile type {command:profile}!
There are nine levels of equipment: Basic, Common, Uncommon, Exotic, Rare, Special, Epic, Legendary and Mythic.
The maximum profitable time between two reports is about 16h. After this time, you will not earn any more points.
You don't have to belong to a guild in order to feed your pet.
The game plays out in real time, which is why events are not available right away.
Wait until your character reaches its destination before continuing your adventure.
In order to know the different rarity levels for items, simply use the {command:rarity} command.
If you type {command:guild}, you will see the mentioned user's guild if they have one.
The {command:pet} command displays all the information about your pet.
The {command:pettrade} command allows you to trade a pet with another player.
Feel like a change of scenery? You can leave a guild with the command {command:guildleave}.
You can add a description to your guild using the command {command:guilddescription}.
It is possible to name a guild elder. To do this, the guild leader must use the {command:guildelder} command.
The {command:sell} command allows you to get rid of an item you no longer use.
The random item from the shop is not always profitable, especially if you already have a proper equipment.
Travelling salesmen never sell legendary or epic equipment, with the sole exception of a certain antiquarian who exclusively sells these.
Use the {command:vote} command to support the bot!
If a guild leader leaves the guild, the status of leader is transferred to the elder of the guild. If there is no elder, the guild is disbanded.
The {command:badges} command gives you more information about badges.
The {command:respawn} command allows you to continue the game if you have been killed during your adventure.
If you want to make a donation and get some small rewards, click here: https://draftbot.com/donate
The classes you can buy differ according to your level.
The game does not end at level 100.
The bot's birthday is April 10.
Requesting reports more often is more profitable.
It is possible to expel a bad guy from a guild with the command {command:guildkick}. It also works with the good guys.
To join a guild, you must be invited by the leader or elder of a guild using the {command:guildinvite} command.
Sharing the bot is a great way to help us.
Most street sellers will offer serious prices. But beware of scammers!
Using a ram attack will also hurt you! Make sure you have enough to take the hit before using it.
The power of your items is limited by your stats. If you have very little defense, you won't have the full power of a legendary armor.
It is possible to create your own event and add it to the bot. For more information, join the bot's Discord: https://discord.gg/AP3Wmzb
The bot is open-source, which means that anyone can read the bot code. Here is the link: https://github.com/DraftBot-A-Discord-Adventure/DraftBot/
You want to help us? Suggest to server administrators to add the bot.
DraftBot does not save any of your personal data. Even your nickname is not saved.
The {command:profile} command displays your current health status.
Rarer pets will allow you to collect better rewards.
When selling a pet, the seller does not receive money but experience for his guild.
The `/ilovedraftbot` command does not exist.
Badges are rare and difficult to obtain.
Your progress on DraftBot is saved even if you play on multiple servers.
There are 4 different tiers of classes.
A pet with a bad attitude may occasionally cause you harm during your adventure. Don't forget to take care of it.
To feed your pet, use the {command:petfeed} command.
You gain access to better pet food sources by joining a guild.
The Mythic tier is the maximum rarity of an item.
You can sell the item stored in your item reserve with the {command:sell} command.
You can follow the rare failures of the bot from this site: https://status.draftbot.com/
This is a joke which as under 1% of chance to appear.
The status "Dead" blocks all commands except the command {command:respawn}.
When you die, you don't lose the contents of your inventory. However, you lose 10% of your points.
It is impossible to sell a feisty pet.
Don't forget to feed your pets.
It isn't possible to place a feisty pet in your guild shelter.
Releasing a feisty pet will cost you money.
It isn't possible to exchange a feisty pet.
It is possible to disable the private messages of the bot using the command {command:notifications}.
Guild rewards may contain a badge if your guild is level 50 or higher.
Winning the first place in the weekly ranking allows you to earn a badge.
You can decide on the content of future updates by using this site: https://feedback.draftbot.com
You can't feed your pet if you have an alteration.
Use the {command:map} command to get info about your destination.
A trip between two places takes between 1 hour and 10 hours on the main island.
During a ride, small events can happen.
travelling merchants sell items at great prices. However, watch out for scammers.
If your friend ends up in jail, you can free them with the {command:unlock} command.
There are more than 200 different items.
There are 27 different places you can explore.
Having a pet that likes you in the reports can give you luck.
You can find pets in your adventures and from guild rewards.
Small events are available every 9min45, and large events in a variable time between 1 hour and 10 hours on the main island.
If you don't have a guild, you can feed your pet with treats.
Si vous voulez que le bot parle en franÃ§ais, utilisez la commande {command:language}.
The development team needs your help. Join the bot Discord server to help write the bot history and more.
Thank you for playing DraftBot.
You can kick a person from a guild without mentioning them, using your leaderboard ranking. If they are 34th on the leaderboard, use the {command:guildkick} command with the number 34 as an argument.
This text may be useful in the future: fzbyeifea
The potion of the death that kills is very rare.
The travelling merchants buy what they sell for a ridiculous price.
The command {command:missions} allows you to display the list of your missions.
The {command:missionsshop} command allows you to spend your gems.
The king's treasure allows you to obtain rarer than average equipment.
The monetary value of a gem changes every day.
Successful completion of missions will get you gems.
Secondary missions don't give you gems.
It is possible to get new secondary missions during your adventure.
The higher you level up, the more secondary mission slots you unlock.
A new daily mission is available every day.
It is possible to find a guild through an announcement on the official bot Discord.
The king's fervour gives you 1000 points and can be bought in the mission shop.
It is not possible to buy the king's fervour more than once a week.
It is possible to know exactly how much a pet likes you thanks to the vet.
It is possible to know what your pet's diet is thanks to the vet.
The vet can be contacted through the mission shop.
The difficulty of the secondary missions you get depends on your level.
The more difficult missions will give you more rewards.
It is possible to recruit new members for your guild through the official bot's Discord.
There are 3 types of missions: campaign missions, daily missions and secondary missions.
The daily mission is the same for all players.
When exchanging a pet with another player, pets lose some love points.
When selling a pet to another player, the pet loses a lot of love points.
Reading the hints can help you progress faster.
The {command:drink} command with the `force` option set to `true` allows you to avoid having to confirm when you drink a potion.
The blue dots on the leaderboard indicate the players that are on the server where the command was made.
The change mission does not allow you to get the rewards of the changed mission
You can change a secondary mission for another one through the mission shop.
You can read our privacy policy by following this link: https://draftbot.com/privacy/
You can read our terms of services by following this link: https://draftbot.com/tos/
By fighting opponents, you earn glory points.
Based on your number of glory points, you are ranked in a league.
Depending on your league, your profile is displayed in a different color.
You can get a bonus every Sunday based on your league using the {command:leaguebonus} command.
The number of points obtained in the league bonus depends on your ranking in the glory ranking.
A combat season ends on Saturday evening, French time.
All players that have more than 500 glory points in the Glorious Ranking undergo a ranking compression at the end of the season.
You must have completed enough ranked fights using the {command:fight} command to participate in the Glorious Ranking.
You must have completed enough ranked fights using the {command:fight} command to receive a league bonus at the end of the season.
It is possible to fight players who have a large gap in glory with you if you do a friendly fight.
You can do up to 3 ranked fights per opponent per season.
In case of a tie in a fight, the combatants' glory points are affected.
The higher your league, the better the equipment you receive with the {command:leaguebonus} command.
The player with the most glory at the end of a combat season wins a badge.
Regular fighting allows you to recover enticing rewards at the end of the week.
Regularly monitor your breath to avoid losing a turn by opting for an attack that is too expensive.
Ranked fights consume your energy. You will have to wait to recover it.
Friendly fights do not consume your energy and do not impact your glory.
You can check your Glorious Ranking using the {command:top glory} command.
Potions and items that allow you to advance time do not allow you to recover your energy.
Potions and items that allow you to advance time do not allow you to advance faster the time of loading of the daily rewards.
Potions and items that allow you to advance time do not allow you to advance faster the time of loading of the guild rewards.
Potions and items that allow you to advance time do not allow you to advance faster the time of loading of the end of season rewards.
The potions and items that allow you to advance time do not allow you to speed up the loading times of end-of-season rewards.
You can recover your energy in the store up to 3 times per combat season.
It is said that around Claire de ville, no one lacks energy to fight.
You can find healing potions in your adventure that allow you to recover health.
You can find energy potions in your adventure that allow you to recover your energy.
If you lose a battle due to inactivity, all of your energy will be lost.
Have you noticed that there are new advices? It's because we are adding new ones regularly!
It is said that there are hostile, virtually unexplored islands beyond the seas.
Members of your guild can help you fight monsters when you visit a mysterious island.
You can see guild members who are on a mysterious island using the {command:guild} command.
The {command:guild} command allows you to see the number of allies who will assist you on the mysterious island.
An 'ally' is a guild member who is currently on the mysterious island or has recently left it.
You will not be able to join a mysterious island if you have just joined a guild.
You can only free one pet per hour.
The other adventurers are your rivals in the quest for the princess! Make sure you choose the correct ones to become your guild partners.
It is said that rare equipment becomes cheaper around the road of wonders.
Three-card monte players stay away from the road of wonders and the swampy road because it is said that a spirit roams there and specifically attacks them.
Did you find all the little hidden secrets in the map?
